resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103842</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103842</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201565</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Estimation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schätzung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évaluation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estimation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Valutazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτίμηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Valoración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Explore size estimation in one, two and three dimensions! Multiple levels of difficulty allow for progressive skill improvement.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie Größe Schätzung in einen, zwei 
und drei Maßen! Mehrfache Stufen der Schwierigkeit lassen 
progressive Fähigkeit Verbesserung zu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez l'évaluation de taille dans une, deux et
trois dimensions ! Les niveaux multiples de la difficulté 
tiennent compte de l'amélioration progressive de compétence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore o estimation do tamanho em uma, dois e 
três dimensões! Os níveis múltiplos da dificuldade permitem 
a melhoria progressiva da habilidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplori la valutazione di formato in una, due e 
tre dimensioni! I livelli multipli della difficoltà tengono 
conto miglioramento progressivo di abilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε την εκτίμηση μεγέθους σε μια, δύο και τρεις 
διαστάσεις! Τα πολλαπλάσια επίπεδα δυσκολίας επιτρέπουν την
προοδευτική βελτίωση ικανότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Explore la valoración de la talla en una, dos y 
tres dimensiones! Los niveles múltiples de la dificultad 
permiten la mejora progresiva de la habilidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201565</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103842</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/estimation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
